metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3094 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: PlainSaslServer.java in Apache Qpid Java before 6.0.3, when the broker is configured to allow plaintext passwords, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (broker termination) via a crafted authentication attempt, which triggers an uncaught exception.

notes.Note: ebarretto> This problem affects only qpid-java.

criterions.comment: qpid-cpp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
